location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham, Council at Bussora (Basra) from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has several holes in its text.

mods.abstract: Administrative letter. States that a copy of letter IOR/R/15/1/2, f 35 1 is enclosed (this is not contained in the file). Shipped by Sallah Carracky.
